pages.text: Salt is an extremely common and very useful component, finding numerous applications in the art of witchcraft. It is useful for enhancing the flavor of dishes and drying components, as well as for restraining creatures of an unclean nature â€“ when combined with $(l:components/silver)silver$(), it can become a significant deterrent to various vile entities attempting to harm you.

pages.title: Obtaining Salt
pages.text: Salt can be obtained by evaporating water using a regular furnace. $(br2)Four handfuls of salt can be combined into a block, much like glowstone dust.
